resources.string:
The Fox hunt is a game where you hunt urban animals without making them suffer; your trophies come from bare sightings and reporting them! Making sighting will also benefit the research on urban animal life in the city of Turku. Just remember not to harass or stress out the animal. Thank you for your input!


In this game you are rewarded from
 - Spotting of an urban animal.
 - Uploading a picture of your spotting
 - You will also collect a small amount of points for any distance travelled.
 - Get more points by collaborating with other players.
 - Add your connections on your team-listing by clicking the horn-symbol and call them up with the call up -button! When your friends accept your invitation, their helmets will appear yellow to you and when they activate upon a call up, you will see their helmets turned red. If you spot something within a call up, you will get extra points of 20%


You also have a chance to win badges!
 - Fox sightings
 - For covering un-roamed areas
 - Surprise badges
 - (Knowledge badges for answering correctly to the random questionnaires; optional mode)
 - Most activities
 - Teamwork
